item.description:
Negation Hearts Night. . At DAMATAS New players welcome, we will teach you how to play. Do [b]not[/b] be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full. There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there. Pizzas are [b]$2.99[/b] on Monday nights.

Negation Hearts is played with two decks of cards.

Two of the same cards like two king of clubs negate and the next highest card of the suit lead takes the cards played.

So, even playing a two has not been safe at times.

 

The scoring and passing are slightly altered from hearts so that new people can join in at any hand.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Negation Hearts at DAMATAS in Salem
